channel.title: Csharp on Shintaro Ikeda
channel.description: Recent content in Csharp on Shintaro Ikeda

item.title: yarana-bot
item.description: yarana-bot is bot application in LINE to help you to do regularly Features Register what you want to do regularly Record it when you do Show you the records Push message at 10:00PM(JST) if you didn’t record your activity. Application link is here. GitHub links https://github.com/momotaro98/yarana-bot https://github.com/momotaro98/yarana-api

item.title: Alert-On-Viber
item.description: Alert-On-Viber is notification system for production alert. It is running on Azure Functions and uses APIs of Viber chat application. Presentation about this creation
